name: d3fc-financial-feed
description: An API for fetching financial time-series data from different sources including Quandl and Coinbase

scripts.bundle: rimraf build && rollup -c && uglifyjs build/d3fc-financial-feed.js --compress --mangle -o build/d3fc-financial-feed.min.js
scripts.test: npm run bundle && eslint index.js src/**/*.js test/**/*.js && jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=test/support/jasmine.json
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
